item.title: Debugging Django emails
item.description: Run in terminal: python -m smtpd -n -c DebuggingServer localhost:1025 After that in Django’s settings.py: EMAIL_HOST = 'localhost' EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD = '' EMAIL_HOST_USER = '' EMAIL_PORT = 1025 EMAIL_USE_SSL = False Then you get all sent email contents printed to terminal:
